room_title: Escape room "Sherlock's Secret" by Escape Port Charlotte in Fort Myers
review: We had a great time visiting Port Charlotte and Escape Port Charlotte. We conquered all of the rooms but needed some help with Sherlock Holmes. The owner and her staff were awesome. They helped us when we needed it and let us figure out the riddles on our own when we showed signs of progress. I would recommend this room to anyone new to the game or those who have done other rooms. They have a perfect amount of puzzles for each room. Thanks for a great time!!

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock's Secret" by Escape Port Charlotte in Fort Myers
review: We had a blast trying to figure our way out of the “Sherlock’s Secret” room!! The staff is so friendly. Great time:)

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock's Secret" by Escape Port Charlotte in Fort Myers
review: What a fun outing for a 3-generation group — 2 teens, a middle-aged parent and a grandparent. We didn’t solve sherlock’s Riddle but had a great time trying. We are already planning our strategy for our next attempt!
